caption: The blog tells the adventure story of the detective and his friend. They uncover a mysterious conspiracy behind a wedding and decide to investigate the truth. They find a series of lies and identity disguises, as well as possible criminal intent and cunning. A murder occurs at the wedding, and the detective and his friend decide to solve the mystery and save lives. Ultimately, the detective proposes an intriguing game for everyone to guess who will be murdered at the wedding. Highlights include the friend and the detective discovering a mysterious conspiracy behind the wedding, them uncovering lies and identity disguises, suspecting possible criminal intent and cunning, a murder occurring at the wedding, both deciding to unravel the mystery and save lives, the detective proposing a game to guess who will be murdered at the wedding, and, within the game, the detective considering his friend the most likely murder suspect. Finally, the detective suggests an interesting game, having everyone guess who will be killed at the wedding, and within the game, he thinks his friend is the most popular murder suspect, while the friend and the detective resolve to solve the puzzle and save lives.
